name: RZTO
description: RZTO is the native token of the RZTO Ecosystem, created by Rizz Network Inc. to integrate blockchain technology with the global telecommunications sector. Its mission is to transform how users interact with wireless networks and digital services by providing a decentralized payment and rewards infrastructure. RZTO allows customers to pay for mobile and telecom services, earn rewards for usage and referrals, and unlock exclusive discounts within the ecosystem. Service providers benefit from a transparent and borderless settlement layer that reduces costs and enhances customer engagement. Beyond telecom applications, RZTO also functions as a governance and utility token across the broader ecosystem â€” powering staking, community incentives, and partner integrations. By combining real-world telecommunications usage with Web3 innovation, RZTO bridges the gap between blockchain finance and everyday connectivity, creating value for both enterprises and global end-users.
